properties.name: config.performance.loops
properties.description: Contains the amount of loops needed to run the performance tests.

properties.name: config.year
properties.description: What year to run. Default of -1 runs all years.

properties.name: config.day
properties.description: From which day to run. Default of -1 runs all days. For example, 2 will run test 2,3,4.. and above.
